1.Why do we need your Email? 
 1.1We need your Email so that we can 
 have a form of contacting you with 
 information relevant to your order and 
 we will only use your Email to improve 
 your experience with us. 
 2.How do you Pay? 
 2.1Payment is completed in store and 
 can be done via card or cash 
 3.Is the Food Fresh? 
 3.1All food is freshly made in the 
 downstairs kitchen and any Food 
 allergies should be checked through 
 the app or with the staff in store 
 4.Where is the Cafe? 
 4.127 Chiltern St, Marylebone, London 
 W1U 7PJ 
 5.How do I order? 
 5.1First complete the sign up form 
 then proceed to login and choose 
 what menu you wish to use according 
 to the time and then tap the items you 
 want and complete your order at the 
 checkout screen
